Info.Description: Applies a smooth, natural-looking blur effect to the image. It works by replacing each pixel with a weighted average of its surrounding pixels, with weights given by a Gaussian function (a bell curve).

Properties.Name: Radius
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the extent of the blur effect. A larger radius results in a more significant blur, while a smaller radius creates a subtler blur.

Properties.Name: Confined
Properties.Summary: Confines the blur to the borders of the image.
